subscription_description: Dengan berlangganan, Anda akan mendapatkan akses tak terbatas ke semua fitur aplikasi. Jika Anda tidak membatalkan sebelum masa percobaan berakhir, Anda akan dikenakan biaya sesuai pilihan di atas sampai Anda membatalkannya
theme_mode_subtitle: Pilih mode tema yang Anda inginkan
about_description: {name} adalah VPN (Virtual Private Network) proxy gratis dan tak terbatas. {name} memungkinkan Anda membuka situs dan aplikasi, menelusuri secara pribadi, dan mengamankan perangkat Anda
not_allowed_description: Server hanya tersedia untuk pengguna premium
also_allowed_with_watch_ad_description: Server hanya tersedia untuk pengguna premium, tetapi Anda juga dapat menggunakannya dengan menonton iklan
no_restore_description: Kamu belum pernah melakukan transaksi sebelumnya
permission_alert_msg: Photos permission should be granted to use this feature, would you like to go to app settings to give photos permission?
storage_permission_msg: Storage permission should be granted to use this feature, would you like to go to app settings to give storage permission?
reference_desc: Share your reference code to others and earn more points
redemption_code_msg: Enter your special code to receive amazing gifts from us for free!
contact_us_desc: Please enter you contact details and admin will soon contact you
claim_desc: Please select your transaction type and fill the details and admin will soon contact you
enter_ref_code_des: Enter your friends reference code to earn more points.
confirm_cancellation_msg: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
